author: JumpingYang001
body:
After "New-Alias -Name "ABCD" -Value "foo" -Option "Constant""
It will show below error for "Remove-Item Alias:ABCD -Force", but we can do it on normal powershell  rather than on the cross PSL, do we have other ways to remove a constant or read-only Alias?

> Remove-Item : Alias was not removed because alias ABCD is constant or
> read-only.
> At line:1 char:1
> - Remove-Item Alias:ABCD -Force
> - ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>   - CategoryInfo          : WriteError: (ABCD:String) [Remove-Item], Session
>     StateUnauthorizedAccessException
>   - FullyQualifiedErrorId : AliasNotRemovable,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.
>     RemoveItemCommand
title: No way to "Remove-Item Alias:ABCD -Force" for Constant Alias
